name: 121nexus
tag_list: personal-media, personalization, pharmaceutical, trace-and-trace, software, technology, politics, political-campaign
overview: 121nexus brought the concept of Personal Media™ to market. The company’s debut product, 121 Campaign™, was deployed with political campaigns in 2012 to create personalized voter experiences centered on issues relevant to each individual voter, using an app that drives up calls to action from voters using field-deployed unique links. 121 Campaign’s customers included Obama for America, where the product played a pivotal role in securing the state of Ohio and winning the 2012 Presidential election. The validation and success of the technology in political campaigns attracted new investors to fund a deployment of the same technology to solve drug recall and counterfeiting problems in pharmaceutical track & trace under the PharTrack™ brand.
